articles.title: I can't wait to stream these 27 new movies on Netflix, Disney Plus, Prime Video, Max, and more in 2025 - TechRadar
articles.content: Cinephiles are in for a treat in 2025 because the number of new movies being released seems almost endless, especially looking at the dockets of some of the biggest studios. Even smaller studios have… [+23216 chars]
